cooked: Hmm, so Peter’s thing made assumptions about the attackers fee margin of error that aren’t valid right now. His analysis assumed the attacker paid 1/2.5th of the victim fees, which would be less than minrelayfee. You could probably get away with just 25% less right now, which would force the victim to pay 2.8x more fees. Big difference!
raw: Hmm, so Peter's thing made assumptions about the attackers fee margin of error that aren't valid right now.
